plugin.name: AutoExec
plugin.description: Automatically run Windower commands in response to events.

plugin.name: Bidder
plugin.description: Open auction and delivery box menus anywhere.

plugin.name: Binder
plugin.description: Bind to the macro keys on your gaming keyboard or mouse.

plugin.name: BlinkMeNot
plugin.description: Stop yourself or other players from blinking.

plugin.name: ChatMon
plugin.description: Adds an audible alert in response to chat events.

plugin.name: Config
plugin.description: Adds several configuration options that are automatically applied to characters during play.

plugin.name: DelayMeNot
plugin.description: Removes the default delay for the macro bar with keyboard controls.

plugin.name: FFOChat
plugin.description: Chat on the FFOChat IRC server.

plugin.name: FFXIDB
plugin.description: Displays an in-game minimap.

plugin.name: FishingCrashFix
plugin.description: Fixes the fishing crash introduced in the March 17 fishing update.

plugin.name: GearCollector
plugin.description: Collect and store gear based on your Spellcast XML profiles.

plugin.name: Guildwork
plugin.description: Interface with guildwork.com

plugin.name: IME
plugin.description: Allows typing in Japanese using the Windows input method editor.

plugin.name: InfoBar
plugin.description: Displays a configurable bar showing information on your targets.

plugin.name: JaZero
plugin.description: Eliminates the job ability lock.

plugin.name: LightLuggage
plugin.description: Automatically stack items in your inventory and lot or pass items.

plugin.name: PlasticSurgeon
plugin.description: Locally alters your race, gender or face.

plugin.name: Run
plugin.description: Start or stop external applications through Windower.

plugin.name: Sandbox
plugin.description: Fix multiboxing chatlog issues.

plugin.name: SSOrganizer
plugin.description: Organizes screenshots based on character and area.

plugin.name: StatusTimer
plugin.description: Displays buff timers below your status effects.

plugin.name: Tickle
plugin.description: Displays the time remaining until your next resting tick.

plugin.name: Timers
plugin.description: Tracks ability and spell recast timers, as well as durations on buffs that you cast.

plugin.name: WeatherMon
plugin.description: Track and play alerts based on weather changes.

plugin.name: WinControl
plugin.description: Manually control window positioning.
